name: ColorBlend FX (itch)
description:
At the center of Splatian's Village...

Another day for our potato gnomes Splatians to do their everyday work...
And another evening to chill and talk around the campfire...
But this evening is special!
Sparkle finally found another use of the mythical Rainbow Powder:
It can change the Essence Of Objects...
The Goddess Ranina must be proud...

At deep caves under Mount Of Ranina...

Another day of Ash-Ing clan protecting the spirit of the Lord...
And another evening to appeal how boring this work is...
But this evening is special!
The Lord is enraged. Splatians are disrupting his plans!
Lord Ashen consumes the Essence Of The World...

And here it begins...

ColorBlend FX is a mythical puzzle-platformer metroidvania where Splatians cooperate to return the Essence back to the world. Splat and stomp juicy slimes, swim in paint pools, overcome deadly traps, find secrets and treasures, solve color and physics puzzles and have a lot of fun in this unique 2.5D experience.. Bbzzzzzzzt Are you feeling colorless right now?

Pathway to S.P.A.R.K. WIP Demo

If you liked the work-in-progress demo, help us to defeat Lord Ashen by spreading the word, recording and streaming your gameplay.

Social Media

  • JOIN DISCORD! - The best place to hang out!
  • Follow the dev on Instagram - most active here!
  • Follow on Twitch - streaming random games & dev streams with beta keys
  • Follow on Twitter

Important note
  • The game only supports XInput controllers as well as a keyboard. You may need extra software for non-XInput controllers.
  • The game may not be colorblind-friendly - it was never tested by colorblind individual, even though we believe the shades of important colors are recognizable.
